name: Automated Short Ideas List Generation
description: This pattern automates the generation of a 50-item list of short ideas, numbered 1-50, entirely through digital means.
tech_stack: Cloud Functions (AWS Lambda or Google Cloud Functions)
llm_insights: Ensuring unique and relevant idea generation
llm_challenges: Ensuring unique and relevant idea generation
llm_recommended_approach: Utilize a cloud function to generate a list of numbered short ideas based on templates or algorithms. Deploy using a serverless architecture to ensure automatic scaling and cost efficiency.
